(Nevermind Code, I can't find that e-mail.  I know in one of them I 
got cut off after I gathered all the damage, so I just had a small 
hole blasted into him that leaked mech-fluid)

Oblitertron:



Multiple shots dug into Oblitertron's armor.  A few were leaking mech 
fluid from the left leg.  A small gash in the gestalt's back.  He 
sent his right foot forward in a kick at the hull of the Ark, his 
stupidity and rage causing him to not even notice or care about his 
wounds.
